definitions.description: Loans held by the customer with the financial institution.

constantValues: Loans held by the customer with the financial institution.

members.name: FH_LoanId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: statecode

members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber

members.name: name
members.description: Required name field.

members.name: accountingClassification
members.description: Indicates whether the financial holding is an asset or a liability.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'accountingClassification_display' is added to the 'FHLoan' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'accountingClassification'
supportingAttribute.name: accountingClassification_display

constantValues: Indicates whether the financial holding is an asset or a liability.

members.name: balance
members.description: The balance owed by borrower on the loan, in the original currency of the financial holding.

constantValues: The balance owed by borrower on the loan, in the original currency of the financial holding.

members.name: balance_Base
members.description: Value of the balance in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the balance in base currency.

members.name: balanceDefault
members.description: Balance converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Balance converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: balanceExchangerate
members.description: Exchange rate between the transaction currency of the financial holding and the default currency (1 unit of transaction currency = X units of default currency).

constantValues: Exchange rate between the transaction currency of the financial holding and the default currency (1 unit of transaction currency = X units of default currency).

members.name: capitalArrears
members.description: Capitalized arrears is the total overdue principal, interest, or other amounts which have been added to capital balance of the loan.

constantValues: Capitalized arrears is the total overdue principal, interest, or other amounts which have been added to capital balance of the loan.

members.name: capitalarrears_Base
members.description: Value of the capitalized arrears in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the capitalized arrears in base currency.

members.name: capitalArrears_default
members.description: Capitalized arrears converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Capitalized arrears converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: collectionRisk
members.description: The level of risk that a borrower may not be able to repay a loan.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.name: collectionRisk_display

constantValues: The level of risk that a borrower may not be able to repay a loan.

members.name: delinquencyStatus
members.description: Indication of whether the customer's loan is delinquent or not (that is, whether any payments are overdue or not).

constantValues: Indication of whether the customer's loan is delinquent or not (that is, whether any payments are overdue or not).

members.name: disbursedAmount
members.description: The amount of loan that has been disbursed to the customer so far.

constantValues: The amount of loan that has been disbursed to the customer so far.

members.name: disbursedamount_Base
members.description: Value of the disbursed amount in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the disbursed amount in base currency.

members.name: disbursedAmount_default
members.description: Disbursed amount converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Disbursed amount converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: disbursementDate
members.description: The date on which the loan was disbursed to the borrower.

constantValues: The date on which the loan was disbursed to the borrower.

members.name: feeArrears
members.description: Total amount of fees for overdue payments on the loan.

constantValues: Total amount of fees for overdue payments on the loan.

members.description: Value of the fee arrears in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the fee arrears in base currency.

members.name: feeArrears_default
members.description: Fee arrears converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Fee arrears converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: installmentAmount
members.description: The equal monthly installment payments a customer makes to the bank toward repayment of the loan (EMI).

constantValues: The equal monthly installment payments a customer makes to the bank toward repayment of the loan (EMI).

members.description: Value of the installment amount in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the installment amount in base currency.

members.name: installmentAmount_default
members.description: Installment amount converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Installment amount converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: integrationKey
members.description: Used by the system integrator to uniquely define the data record.

constantValues: Used by the system integrator to uniquely define the data record.

members.name: interestArrears
members.description: Total overdue interest amount on the loan.

constantValues: Total overdue interest amount on the loan.

members.name: interestarrears_Base
members.description: Value of the interest arrears in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the interest arrears in base currency.

members.name: interestArrears_default
members.description: Interest arrears converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Interest arrears converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: interestrate
members.description: The rate of interest charged to the loan borrower during a defined period or term during the course of a loan.

constantValues: The rate of interest charged to the loan borrower during a defined period or term during the course of a loan.

members.name: interestReviewPeriod
members.description: The time period that defines the periodic interest rate timeframe.

constantValues: The time period that defines the periodic interest rate timeframe.

members.name: interestType
members.description: The type of interest charged on the loan: fixed, periodical, floating, etc.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.name: interestType_display

members.name: lastPaymentAmount
members.description: The amount that was paid by the customer towards the loan in the last loan payment.

constantValues: The amount that was paid by the customer towards the loan in the last loan payment.

members.name: lastpaymentamount_Base
members.description: Value of the last payment amount in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the last payment amount in base currency.

members.name: lastPaymentAmount_default
members.description: Last payment amount converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Last payment amount converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: lastPaymentDate
members.description: The date on which the last repayment towards the loan was made by the customer.

constantValues: The date on which the last repayment towards the loan was made by the customer.

members.name: loanStartDate
members.description: The date on which the first repayment on the loan is made.

constantValues: The date on which the first repayment on the loan is made.

members.name: maturitydate
members.description: The date on which the final payment is due on a financial holding. This can be a repayment towards an investment, a loan, or a saving.

constantValues: The date on which the final payment is due on a financial holding. This can be a repayment towards an investment, a loan, or a saving.

members.name: modeofPayment
members.description: The method that customer is making repayments towards the loan.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'modeofPayment_display' is added to the 'FHLoan' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'modeofPayment'
supportingAttribute.name: modeofPayment_display

constantValues: The method that customer is making repayments towards the loan.

members.name: nextInterestReviewDate
members.description: In case of periodical interest, the next interest review date.

constantValues: In case of periodical interest, the next interest review date.

members.name: nextPaymentAmount
members.description: The amount that needs to be paid by the customer towards the loan in the next installment.

constantValues: The amount that needs to be paid by the customer towards the loan in the next installment.

members.name: nextpaymentamount_Base
members.description: Value of the next payment amount in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the next payment amount in base currency.

members.name: nextPaymentAmount_default
members.description: Next payment amount converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Next payment amount converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: nextPaymentDate
members.description: The date on which the next payment towards the financial holding is due. This can be applied to credits and loans.

constantValues: The date on which the next payment towards the financial holding is due. This can be applied to credits and loans.

members.name: numberofDeferralsMade
members.description: Total number of installment deferrals made by the customer (i.e. number of times customer has taken a loan repayment holiday from the bank).

constantValues: Total number of installment deferrals made by the customer (i.e. number of times customer has taken a loan repayment holiday from the bank).

members.name: numberofInstallmentsPaid
members.description: Total number of installments that have been paid back by the customer so far.

constantValues: Total number of installments that have been paid back by the customer so far.

members.name: overdueDate
members.description: The date on which the repayment was missed and the loan became overdue.

constantValues: The date on which the repayment was missed and the loan became overdue.

members.name: principalAmount
members.description: The principal amount of the financial holding.

constantValues: The principal amount of the financial holding.

members.name: principalamount_Base
members.description: Value of the principal amount in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the principal amount in base currency.

members.name: principalAmount_default
members.description: Principal amount converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Principal amount converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: repaymentAccount
members.description: Source account of repayments.

members.name: totalArrear
members.description: The total amount of repayments towards the loan which have been missed by the customer and are overdue.

constantValues: The total amount of repayments towards the loan which have been missed by the customer and are overdue.

members.name: totalarrear_Base
members.description: Value of the total arrear in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the total arrear in base currency.

members.name: totalArrear_default
members.description: Total arrear converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Total arrear converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: totalInterestPaid
members.description: Total amount of payments made towards interest of the loan to date.

constantValues: Total amount of payments made towards interest of the loan to date.

members.name: totalinterestpaid_Base
members.description: Value of the total interest paid in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the total interest paid in base currency.

members.name: totalInterestPaid_default
members.description: Total interest paid converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: balanceDisplayValue
members.description: Display value shows the balance of a financial holding in accordance with the type of the financial holding. Financial holdings that are typically defined as a customer's liabilities (such as lines of credit and loans) are presented as positive when the customer owes money to the financial institution (that is, a loan with an accounting value of -500 will appear as 500). In the inverse case: the display value will be negative for debit balances on a credit financial holding (such as overpayment of a credit card), or overdrawn account.

constantValues: Display value shows the balance of a financial holding in accordance with the type of the financial holding. Financial holdings that are typically defined as a customer's liabilities (such as lines of credit and loans) are presented as positive when the customer owes money to the financial institution (that is, a loan with an accounting value of -500 will appear as 500). In the inverse case: the display value will be negative for debit balances on a credit financial holding (such as overpayment of a credit card), or overdrawn account.

members.name: balancedisplayvalue_Base
members.description: Value of the balance display value in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the balance display value in base currency.

members.name: dayspastdue
members.description: The number of days that the customer has been in overdue status for this loan account.

constantValues: The number of days that the customer has been in overdue status for this loan account.
